QuestData.Title: The Yard Arm of the Law
QuestData.Description:
I'm not de only pirate Zem'lan has had strung up around de port. Hangin' on de yard arm is his favorite form of punishment for de crew.
We can't feel pain and don't stay dead, so his options are limited.
Look for more crewmates hangin' around town. Tell dem to meet me here after you free dem.
After weeks of hanging helplessly while being mocked and abused by de rest of de crew, I bet dey be willin' to discuss mutiny.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free Quartermaster Tulmac, Gunner Bosanya, and Jukanga the Snitch.
